events.activityname: Supply & Delivery of Uniform for Palarong Bicol 2020 Official-Delegates and Athletes
events.content: The Palarong Bicol ( Bikol : Pakawat nin Bikol ) is an annual festival of various sports by the three (13) divisions of public schools ( Department of Education ) of the Bicol Region . Among the cops are seven (7) cities: Iriga , Legazpi , Ligao , Masbate , Naga , Sorsogon and Tabaco up to six (6) provinces: Albay , Camarines Norte , Camarines Sur , Catanduanes , Masbatesalt Sorsogon

events.activityname: Groundbreaking of Brgy. Pinagbobong Multipurpose Building
events.content: Pinagbobong is a barangay in the city of Tabaco, in the province of Albay. Its population as determined by the 2015 Census was2,992. This represented 2.24% of the total population of Tabaco.

events.activityname: Groundbreaking of Brgy. San Antonio Multipurpose Building
events.content: San Antonio is a barangay in the city of Tabaco, in the province of Albay. Its population as determined by the 2015 Census was 5,393. This represented 4.03% of the total population of Tabaco
